job_details.Vacaturetitel: Senior Linux Systems Engineer (On-Premise and Cloud)
job_details.Functieomschrijving:
* You will work in a team of highly skilled engineers, to:
     * Achieve uptime >99.99%.
     * Manage and expand the physical servers, OS's and networks in multiple datacenters, including our AWS cloud platforms.
     * Understand a complex technical architecture with a high degree of customisation.
     * Operate and improve our automation tooling.
     * Participate in 24/7 on-call rotation schedule.
     * Provide a flexible infrastructure to the rest of the company
     * Work with a DevOps mindset with other teams within the company to bring our products to a large number of corporate customers worldwide.
     * Manage & Support our Cloud Infrastructure to:
     * Design, deploy (via Terraform), and manage AWS cloud infrastructure components (EC2 instances, VPC, EKS, S3, EFS, etc.).
     * Optimize cloud resources for cost efficiency and performance.
     * Monitor and maintain high availability and fault tolerance of cloud services.
     * Ensure compliance with security best practices and industry standards.
job_details.full_text:
Senior Linux Systems Engineer (On-Premise and Cloud)

* You will work in a team of highly skilled engineers, to:
     * Achieve uptime >99.99%.
     * Manage and expand the physical servers, OS's and networks in multiple datacenters, including our AWS cloud platforms.
     * Understand a complex technical architecture with a high degree of customisation.
     * Operate and improve our automation tooling.
     * Participate in 24/7 on-call rotation schedule.
     * Provide a flexible infrastructure to the rest of the company
     * Work with a DevOps mindset with other teams within the company to bring our products to a large number of corporate customers worldwide.
     * Manage & Support our Cloud Infrastructure to:
     * Design, deploy (via Terraform), and manage AWS cloud infrastructure components (EC2 instances, VPC, EKS, S3, EFS, etc.).
     * Optimize cloud resources for cost efficiency and performance.
     * Monitor and maintain high availability and fault tolerance of cloud services.
     * Ensure compliance with security best practices and industry standards.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on traditional systems engineering, infrastructure management, and cloud operations, with no mention of AI, machine learning, or generative models. The core responsibilities are centered around Linux systems, networking, and cloud infrastructure deployment and maintenance, which falls outside the scope of AI-focused roles.

phrases.phrase: Provide a flexible infrastructure to the rest of the company
phrases.justification: This phrase indicates an understanding of how the infrastructure supports the broader company's needs and goals.

phrases.phrase: Work with a DevOps mindset with other teams within the company to bring our products to a large number of corporate customers worldwide.
phrases.justification: This highlights the need to understand how infrastructure and product delivery contribute to business objectives and customer reach.

phrases.phrase: Design, deploy (via Terraform), and manage AWS cloud infrastructure components
phrases.justification: While focused on infrastructure, the design and deployment aspects using tools like Terraform involve software development principles for infrastructure as code.

phrases.phrase: Achieve uptime >99.99%.
phrases.justification: This is a key operational metric for ensuring service availability and reliability, a core concern in MLOps.

phrases.phrase: Manage and expand the physical servers, OS's and networks in multiple datacenters, including our AWS cloud platforms.
phrases.justification: This describes the management and maintenance of production infrastructure, a fundamental aspect of operations engineering.

phrases.phrase: Operate and improve our automation tooling.
phrases.justification: Automation is a critical component of efficient operations and MLOps pipelines.

phrases.phrase: Participate in 24/7 on-call rotation schedule.
phrases.justification: This indicates responsibility for maintaining production systems and responding to incidents, a common duty in operations roles.

phrases.phrase: Manage & Support our Cloud Infrastructure
phrases.justification: Directly relates to the operational management of cloud-based systems.

phrases.phrase: Optimize cloud resources for cost efficiency and performance.
phrases.justification: Performance and cost optimization are key operational concerns for deployed systems.

phrases.phrase: Monitor and maintain high availability and fault tolerance of cloud services.
phrases.justification: Monitoring and ensuring high availability are core responsibilities of operations engineering.

phrases.phrase: Ensure compliance with security best practices and industry standards.
phrases.justification: Security and compliance are crucial aspects of maintaining production systems.
